book.synopsis: Set in medieval Norway, The Snake Pit follows Olav and Ingunn, who, though raised as brother sister, have become lovers in a world caught between the fading sphere of pagan worship and vendettas and the expansion of Christianity.
book.title_long: The Snake Pit: The Master of Hestviken, Vol. 2
